scripts.docker-build: docker system prune -af;docker-compose build --pull --parallel --force-rm && ./updateVersion.sh && ver=$(awk 'FNR <= 1' version) && docker tag ionrev/ir-template-server ionrev/ir-template-server:${ver} && docker tag ionrev/ir-template-client ionrev/ir-template-client:${ver} && docker push ionrev/ir-template-server && docker push ionrev/ir-template-client && git add . && git commit -m ${ver} && git push
scripts.d-push: docker tag ionrev/ir-template-server ionrev/ir-template-server:${ver} && docker tag ionrev/ir-template-client ionrev/ir-template-client:${ver} && docker push ionrev/ir-template-server && docker push ionrev/ir-template-client
